name: Night Job
description:
Ah, the wonders of life: Living! Laughing! Loving! Running an underground organ trafficking facility!... Yeah...

Night Job is a game. You can play it. I hope you are not startled by the screaming.

In Night Job you are a surgeon! Go with your good ol’ pal Sock to be gay and do crimes!

GET THEM ORGANS FOR THEM MONEY'S!!!!!!

CW: Gore, Drug Usage, Swear Words, First Degree Murder

FULLSCREEN HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Have fun!
